title: parama sukhAnanda
sahitya:
parama sukhAnanda darishanam kaNDEn patita pAvanA sharaNam sharaNam sharNam


anupallavi

  maraNa bhayamum illai mAtrAr tuyarum illai mangaLa sutantara mAdhava jyOtiyin


caraNam    pongum punnakai vaLar pangaya mukhamum pUngkuzhal UdiDum tIngkani vAyum
kangulaip-piLand-uLak-kavalaitayit-tIrttiDum kaNNan kariya mEgha vaNNan giridharanin
